nodes.text: Sranfrak Creek was a location in Pau City on Utapau, and the home of Fyzen Gor's parents. Cli Pastayra of the Wandering Star instructed his gunners to burn down his family home and kill his parents in the event of his death. When Pastayra was about to be murdered by Fenbolt, a droid reprogrammed by Gor, he revealed his threat, but Gor disregarded it, letting Fenbolt kill Pastayra.
